body: <button type="button" class="btn btn-${4:sm|lg} btn-${5:primary|secondary|success|danger|warning|info|light|dark}" data-bs-toggle="popover" title="${2:Popover title}" data-bs-content="${3:Popover description}">${1:button text}</button>

<button type="button" class="btn btn-${2:sm|lg} btn-${3:primary|secondary|success|danger|warning|info|light|dark}" data-bs-container="body" data-bs-toggle="popover" data-bs-placement="${1:top|right|bottom|left}" data-bs-content="${1:Top|right|bottom|left} popover">
Bootstrap v5 direction popover.description: Bootstrap v5 popover with top, left, right, bottom

body: ${1:Dismissible popover}
